# Interface Edge

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "Edge".

interface Edge {  
condition_expression?: string;  
condition_id?: string;  
from_node: string;  
loop?: string | boolean;  
optional?: string | boolean;  
to_node: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

condition_expression? condition_id? from_node loop? optional? to_node

## Properties

### `Optional`condition_expression

condition_expression?: string

CEL template expression for edge condition

### `Optional`condition_id

condition_id?: string

ID of a component that implements EdgeCondition

### from_node

from_node: string

ID of the source node

### `Optional`loop

loop?: string | boolean

Whether this edge creates a loop

### `Optional`optional

optional?: string | boolean

Whether this edge is optional

### to_node

to_node: string

ID of the destination node
